homeDirectory: You are running Gemini CLI in your home directory. It is recommended to run in a project-specific directory.
rootDirectory: Warning: You are running Gemini CLI in the root directory. Your entire folder structure will be used for context. It is strongly recommended to run in a project-specific directory.
fileSystemError: Could not verify the current directory due to a file system error.
tempFileDelete: Warning: Could not delete temporary warnings file.
sandboxBuild: Try running `npm run build:all` or `npm run build:sandbox` under the gemini-cli repo to build it locally, or check the image name and your network connection.
